title: The video's sponsored, but the graphs are REAL - SOUNDPEATS Earbuds
description: Thanks to SOUNDPEATS for sponsoring todays video! Buy them from US/UK/DE Amazon using the links below. Codes can be used on the Amazon and Soundpeats Website, valid for at least 3 months.  Buy Air3 Deluxe HS on Amazon using code SPFORSCT US  UK  DE   Buy Capsule3 Pro on Amazon using code SCIRCUIT US  UK  DE   Check more at SOUNDPEATS Website:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Don't sleep on SOUNDPEATS 0:27 Time to unbox! 2:24 Fitment + Specs 3:24 Capsule3 Pro Graphs courtesy of Labs 4:22 Audio Test 5:21 Air3 Deluxe HS Graphs courtesy of Labs 5:43 EQ Settings and Graphs
